lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant scored 24 points in the former Texas star's first game in Dallas in almost two years, and the Oklahoma City Thunder extended their winning streak to a season-best seven games by holding on for a 109-106 victory over the Mavericks on Friday night.

headline.print_headline: Durant, Thunder Top Mavs 109-106 for Season-Best 7-Game Run
headline.main: Durant, Thunder Top Mavs 109-106 for Season-Best 7-Game Run
